title: Valentines day skin
body:
I just finished watching The Curse of the Sad Mummy song on Facebook while scrolling down the LoL page and thought.  What if Riot gave Amumu {{champion:32}}  a Valentines skin to share the love?

Maybe it is a bad idea maybe it is good i don't know.  What are your thoughts on this?

Some name ideas, crestfallen Amumu, Rejected Amumu, Gloomy Amumu, Grave Amumu, Heavy Hearted Amumu, Morbid Amumu, Pitiful Amumu, Sorrowful Amumu, Teary-Eye Amumu, Weeping Amumu.  Maybe some of them are not really to do with Valentines Day but i was thinking more of his feelings when not shown the love.

                                                              {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}   Lets Be Friends!

replies.body: Love seeker Amumu. But after the Heartbroken reply nothing else seems to sound better than that.
I like the Heavy-Hearted Amumu Idea, cause his heart is full of sorrow and lonelyness that it would be heavy with feelings kinda thing.  But Heartbroken Amumu works just as well.
